rows.label: qev019301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, if it ain't [ST:playername ].
You're looking smug as ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0002
rows.name:
How's all MY money from MY research probe viewers
treating you, ya thievin' little rat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0010
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0011
rows.name:
Explain how you earn your money
through legitimate means.

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0020
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Tobias you seek a higher cause than mere profit.

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, lookee here! It's a damn philosophy major!
Save the high-and-mighty act for the circus, pal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0004
rows.name:
You probably think a starving kid stealing bread from
the rich is a dangerous criminal, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0005
rows.name:
You think your vision of justice makes you so special?
'Cause I'm happy to martyr you for it unless you pull
all your data probes out, posthaste![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, swell. Because hypocrisy is juuuust what you been
missing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0007
rows.name:
You need to eat, yeah? Need bullets to survive?
Then you'd better have some money, genius![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0008
rows.name:
But if you're so pure and selfless, put your money
where your mouth is and pull out all your damn
data probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0009
rows.name: But no. Of course you won't do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0010
rows.name:
So don't try to pretend you ain't in this for the money,
same as me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0011
rows.name: Now let's settle this for good and all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I've installed research probes all over Mira since
you cheated on our last little wager, and, [ST:gender p1=brother p2=sister ],
you don't stand a chance of beating me this time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0013
rows.name:
So if you got the guts, come take me on again.
And whoever wins this time gets to be the king of 
swingtown for KEEPS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0014
rows.name:
You up to it, pal? 'Cause I'm done running.
You beat me, I'll do whatever you say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Ha! It's your grave, buddy. But before we start,
you gotta answer one question...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0016
rows.name: Why do you work on expanding FrontierNav?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0017
rows.name:
And I ain't talking about the "I want a bright future
for mankind" bullplop. I mean the REAL reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0018
rows.name:
I want to know what it is that turns your gears.
The truth! Not some warmed-over lie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0030
rows.name: Speak of Mankind's Future

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Tobias you honestly want
to improve conditions for all.

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0040
rows.name: Talk of Money

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0041
rows.name:
Admit there's something that you
REALLY want to buy.

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0019
rows.name: See, this is why I don't trust people like you and Kirsty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0020
rows.name:
'Cause me? I've got something to build, and that means
I need whole boatloads of cash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0021
rows.name:
I ain't no daisy-headed idiot like you! So watch your
back, flower child, because I'm gonna RIP YOUR
PETALS CLEAN OUT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0022
rows.name: You're more honest than Kirsty. I'll give ya that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0023
rows.name:
But you're not the only one chasing after a big-ticket
item here, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0024
rows.name:
And ol' Tobias can out-greed anyone. So watch your
back, pal, because I'm gonna CRUSH you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0025
rows.name:
I've been making my living this way a long time, kid,
and I'm not letting some wide-eyed rook beat me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0026
rows.name:
We race to 130,000 credits in sightseeing profits.
I'll wring that much out of FrontierNav in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0027
rows.name:
After losing to you, I been planting new data probes
all over Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0028
rows.name:
And I ain't losing again! So let's lay it all out on the
table, pal... How much ya got?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0029
rows.name: ...WHAT?! B-but that ain't... RRAAUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0030
rows.name: How in the sweet hell do you keep out-earning me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0031
rows.name: Who ARE you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0050
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0051
rows.name: Claim to be Mira's greatest explorer.

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0060
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0061
rows.name: Shrug and say you're just a BLADE.

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0032
rows.name:
Don't strain your back climbin' down from that high
horse you're on, pal! ...Though I guess you got the
numbers what to back it up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0033
rows.name:
No way. There's no way that "just a BLADE" could
beat me twice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0034
rows.name:
This... This isn't over yet! And to hell with the risk,
you hear? I'm gonna turn this around in one shot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'm gonna plant data probes all around the Ganglion's
home base in Cauldros and rack up more money than
you ever SEEN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0036
rows.name: ...Oh. It's you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0037
rows.name:
Come here to laugh at ol' Tobias? Well, go ahead.
I came here to finally beat you, but Vainamo, the
Bellower got to me first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0038
rows.name:
Hungry bastard's still around, too.
Probably just waiting to finish the job...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0039
rows.name:
He's persistent, which I like. But he also wants to eat
me, which I don't much care for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0070
rows.name: Aid

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0071
rows.name: Offer Tobias your assistance.

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0080
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Tobias he must survive, no matter what occurs.

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0040
rows.name:
The goody-goody act never stops with you, does it?
Watch your back with an attitude like that, pal.
Good little helpers like you tend to die young.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0041
rows.name: What are ya, my mom? Spare me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0042
rows.name: Ah well, it's free advice. Might as well take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0043
rows.name:
Guess I'll just lay low for a while and hope he's a
lousy tracker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0044
rows.name:
...You be careful, yeah?
If that thing finds you, it's gonna hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0045
rows.name:
I was gonna beat Vainamo, the Bellower and finally
prove I was better than you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0046
rows.name:
Sure, that's some long odds, but nobody ever got rich
by playing it safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0047
rows.name:
But looks like I lost that gamble, eh? Heh... Yeah.
Look, forget about me and just...go already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0048
rows.name: I...I lost its signal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0049
rows.name:
You... No, you didn't kill Vainamo, the Bellower.
You couldn't! ...Could ya?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0090
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0091
rows.name: Flex a little, then nod a few times like it's no big.

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0100
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0101
rows.name: Say you only just managed to defeat the horrid tyrant.

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0066
rows.name:
Sweet mother of marmalade...
I been picking fights with the wrong cat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0050
rows.name:
No kidding. I've been all over this rock, and I ain't
never seen anything as nasty as that before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well, hell. I guess a guy knows when he's beat, yeah?
I'll stay outta your way from now on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0052
rows.name:
Stick your research probes where you want.
Take all the money. I don't care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0053
rows.name:
And you're the boss of me now, so whatever you tell
me to do, I'll do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0054
rows.name:
What's it gonna be? You going to take my money?
Work me till I puke blood? Make me dance for sailors
and charge two bits a gander?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0110
rows.name: Order

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0111
rows.name: Make Tobias recommit himself to serving NLA.

rows.label: qev019301_JNK0120
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev019301_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Tobias why he's so obsessed with money.

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0055
rows.name: What? Oh, for the love of...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0056
rows.name:
You remind me of the ones who put me on the White
Whale. They were soft, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0057
rows.name: And now I have to finish the project they left behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0058
rows.name:
I ain't got time to sit around grovelingâ€”got capital to
raise and all that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0059
rows.name:
Wait, what? You ain't gonna make me do nothing
embarrassing? Just gonna ask me a question?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0060
rows.name:
Yeah, well, I was gonna use FrontierNav to make a
mountain of cash, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0061
rows.name:
But it was all so I could finish the project that me and
my friends started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0062
rows.name:
It'll cost a fortune. More than you could imagine.
Which is why I have to earn money any way I can,
no matter what people think of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0063
rows.name:
Project's classified, so I can't say much more, but...
Well, it's something humanity won't mind having
around. Let's leave it at that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0064
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm off. And if you don't have any demands,
a loss is a loss, and I'll pay a fair prize.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019301_MSG0065
rows.name: ...Here. Take it. So long.[ST:wait ]
